name: I'll Come See You
description:
I'll Come See You

A short, fragile moment between a badly injured man and the stranger who came to his aid.

Features

  • <10min playtime
  • Linear story
  • Developed in 1 week

Warnings

  • Off-screen injuries, possibly death

Credits

  • Story, art and programming by Cryoslight
  • Royalty-free music by Eric Matyas

This game was made for the O2A2 - Only One of Any Asset visual novel jam in July 2021. According to the jam rules, I'll Come See You only contains one of each asset type and is less than 1000 words long.

You may also be interested in my other similarly bite-sized visual novel which I made for the O2A2 jam of 2020:
